content: I also think I need to be stating what I am looking for and asking for help, first and foremost, the roles that were in the previous chat with the opportunity to transform with AI and asking for help from the network with referrals, insight, reconnecting if they can help, etc. That basically since the traditional job search is dead, AI told me that I need to be engaging on social media. Personally, I think this is required to beat the current system of recruiting by widening the net.
